items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Each life taken makes the next a little easier.

items.name: Fertile Mind
explicitMods: Dexterity from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Intelligence
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: "The swallow flew fast and took many turns,
spilling a seed where no plant had grown before.
This seed grew and grew until the desert became fertile and abundant.
Your mind is like this seed."
- Maraketh Proverb

items.name: The Vigil
explicitMods: With at least 40 Strength in Radius, Hits with Vigilant Strike Fortify you and Nearby Allies for 3 seconds
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: When Voll took the throne,
He swore to care for the empire with eyes open.
And so he looked to the salvation of his people,
Blind to the damnation in his hands.

items.name: Chimeric Glisten
explicitMods: 12% increased Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Vaal Sentencing
explicitMods: 117% increased Vaal Skill Critical Strike Chance
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: In their final days, every crime was punishable by death.
Atziri's empire ran on blood, but the blood was running dry.

items.name: Brute Force Solution
explicitMods: Strength from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Intelligence
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Picking a lock takes an immense amount of skill and practice.
Breaking it with a hammer takes about three seconds.

items.name: Growing Agony
explicitMods: With at least 40 Dexterity in Radius, Viper Strike deals 2% increased Damage with Hits and Poison for each Poison on the Enemy
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Maligaro understood that devotion to science,
Means devotion to trial and error.
For Maligaro's errors, death was slow,
And very painful.

items.name: Martial Artistry
explicitMods: 15% increased Area of Effect while Unarmed
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: A gentle hand rarely leaves a mark on the world.

items.name: Dead Reckoning
explicitMods: Minions have +9% to all Elemental Resistances
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Summon Skeletons can Summon up to 3 Skeleton Mages
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: A mage from the coast rode up on a broken nag, legs burnt to his bones.
Before he collapsed, he uttered:
"I watched the world we know end yesterday."

items.name: To Dust
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

It just comes for some much sooner.

items.secDescrText: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt. Enemies take 25% increased Damage from Trap or Mine Hits

that it was even edible.

The twilight shroud her only blade,
Who now hears her feathersteps flowing?
Beneath the stars, the moondrops glowing.
